phrase_rewrite.label_msg_rewrite_phrase: Type your secret phrase to confirm that you wrote it down correctly:

hint.exist: Click the + icon to add a new account.

title.no_clock_sync: Clock of host not in sync

description.no_clock_sync:
Mac: System Preferences -> Date & Time -> Uncheck and recheck 'Set date and time automatically'

 Linux: Settings > System -> Date & Time -> Uncheck and recheck 'Automatic Date & Time'

 Windows: Control Panel -> 'Clock, Language, and Region' -> 'Date and Time' -> Uncheck and recheck 'Set date and time automatically'
